lead_paragraph: What if the asteroid that forever changed life on Earth missed the planet completely and giant dinosaurs never became extinct? While traveling through a harsh and mysterious landscape, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend, learns the power of confronting his fears and discovers what he is truly capable of.
